content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** the bobble edge dish mat uses less than one caron cotton cake and a 4mm hook it creates a practical finished piece that can be used at your home cottage or trailer when you need a little extra drying space make one to add into a gift basket for a house-warming gift or holiday celebration **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions - special stitch tutorials with direct links for detailed walk throughs - clear photos - required tools approximate yardage required this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase *please note this is a digital file and not a finished product* *there will be no refunds on digital products*
